bool CxImage::SplitCMYK ( CxImage *  c,
CxImage *  m,
CxImage *  y,
CxImage *  k 
) [inherited]

Extract CMYK channels from the image. Each channel is an 8 bit grayscale image.

Parameters:
c,m,y,k,: pointers to CxImage objects, to store the splited channels
Returns:
true if everything is ok
